titleStmt.title: The arte of reason, rightly termed, witcraft teaching a perfect way to argue and dispute. Made by Raphe Leuer. Seene and allowed according to the order appointed in the Queenes Maiesties iniunctions.
titleStmt.author: Lever, Ralph, d. 1584.

titleStmt.title: The arte of reason, rightly termed, witcraft teaching a perfect way to argue and dispute. Made by Raphe Leuer. Seene and allowed according to the order appointed in the Queenes Maiesties iniunctions.
titleStmt.author: Lever, Ralph, d. 1584.

publicationStmt.publisher: By H. Bynneman, dwelling in Knightrider streate, at the signe of the Mermayde. Anno. 1573. These bookes are to be solde at his shop at the northvvest dore of Paules church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
